name: Microsoft Excel信息泄露漏洞（CNVD-2025-24395）
product: ["Microsoft Access 2016", "Microsoft Excel 2016", "Microsoft Office Online Server", "Microsoft SharePoint Enterprise Server 2016", "Microsoft SharePoint Server 2019", "Microsoft 365 Apps for Enterprise", "Microsoft Office LTSC 2021", "Microsoft Office LTSC for Mac 2021", "Microsoft Office 2019", "Microsoft Microsoft Office LTSC 2024", "Microsoft Office LTSC for Mac 2024"]
description: Microsoft Excel是美国微软（Microsoft）公司的一款Office套件中的电子表格处理软件。Microsoft Excel存在信息泄露漏洞，攻击者可利用该漏洞获取敏感信息。
solution:
厂商已发布了漏洞修复程序，请及时关注更新：
https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2025-59235
patch: Microsoft Excel信息泄露漏洞（CNVD-2025-24395）的补丁
